SEARCH
Package AtomicInterface.consensus.synch

Interface AtomicApproximateValueArray<V extends Number & Comparable<V>>

Type Parameters:
V - Type of elements in array. Should always be a number
All Superinterfaces:
ApproximatePrimitive
public interface AtomicApproximateValueArray<V extends Number & Comparable<V>> extends ApproximatePrimitive
A fixed-size array of elements of type V whose elements can be updated atomically using Approximate Consensus. Follows a similar interface to java.lang.concurrent.atomic.AtomicIntegerArray Not implemented.
